dataset_info.name: LeukoApp Test Dataset
dataset_info.description: Representative WBC smear images for testing the LeukoApp leukemia detection model

normal_neutrophil_01.svg.description: Mature neutrophil with segmented nucleus (3-5 lobes), fine chromatin, and neutral-staining cytoplasm with fine granules

normal_lymphocyte_01.svg.description: Small mature lymphocyte with round, dense nucleus and scanty basophilic cytoplasm

normal_monocyte_01.svg.description: Large monocyte with kidney-shaped nucleus, fine chromatin, and abundant gray-blue cytoplasm

acute_lymphoblastic_leukemia_01.svg.description: Immature lymphoblast with large nucleus, prominent nucleoli, and scanty basophilic cytoplasm

chronic_myeloid_leukemia_01.svg.description: Abnormal myeloid cell with irregular nucleus, excessive granulation, and possible Auer rods

acute_myeloid_leukemia_01.svg.description: Myeloblast with large nucleus, multiple prominent nucleoli, and characteristic Auer rods

validation_criteria.image_acceptance: All images should pass blood smear validation
validation_criteria.memory_usage: Monitor for memory leaks during batch processing

troubleshooting.if_validation_fails: Check image format, ensure SVG is properly rendered
troubleshooting.if_low_confidence: Normal for SVG test images, real microscopy images typically show higher confidence
troubleshooting.if_wrong_classification: May indicate model needs retraining or parameter adjustment

usage_instructions.individual_testing: Upload each image separately through the LeukoApp interface
usage_instructions.batch_testing: Use the provided zip file for systematic testing
expected_workflow: 3. Check prediction result matches expected classification
4. Verify confidence score is within acceptable range

technical_notes.image_format: SVG vector format for scalability and editability
technical_notes.compatibility: Should work with both GoogLeNet and ViT-Large models
